textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Helmut Lang launched his namesake label in 1986, and by the 1990s the popularity of his designs had exploded among creative and fashion communities. The 2006 relaunch saw the brand continuing exploration of Helmut Lang’s modernist aesthetic and use of fabric. The label brings to life a vision of clothing that feels right, right now, all the while honoring its roots and paying homage to the legendary designer.
